column4: Does anyone here know how to mount a partition image (ie, made with dd if= of=) in Windows XP, with the added caveat that the image is 60GB and is on an ext2 partition mounted with the IFS driver?
if you're just using it as RO ntfs should work fine
That won't help him at all.
oh hes on livecd, sry i wasn't aware of that. or that he needed write :x.
